meanings: (신·종교 등을) believe in, have faith in

meanings.meaning: give somebody the benefit of the doubt

vlive.korean: [믿어요333] [연리더] 언니 무서워한다! She's getting scared. 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 전생 체험하다가 죽음을 경험한 로켓펀치 연희 #아이돌 #리얼리티 ┃로켓펀치 [펀치타임

[1차] 그냥 나 믿어 봐? [1st try] Trust me, OK? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “여친이들의 달콤쌉싸름한 초콜릿 만들기” (여자친구 : GFRIEND)

examples.korean: It means I believe in my son. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 전 제 아들을 믿어요 User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 유루밍(girr****)

examples.korean: Do you have faith you can win? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신이 이길 수 있으리라 믿어요? User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 cielcine(ciel****)

examples.korean: I believe you when you say so. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신이 그렇게 말할 때 난 믿어요. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 cielcine(ciel****)
examples.english: I believe you when you say so. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Believe me, it won't last forever. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 날 믿어요, 평생 가지는 않아요. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 주유천하(biog****)

examples.korean: But you can take my word for it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 하지만, 당신은 내말을 믿어요. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 인생을 재미있게(ihha****)
